protocol_name: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
protocol_name_html: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
before_start:
Determine number of samples and standards to test in 96 well plate format.  Multiply by 2 if running everything in duplicate for total number of wells.  

Use a black-walled plate with black bottoms if possible.  Black-sided wells with clear bottoms or white-sided wells will also work, but background will be higher due to reflected fluorescence in the wells.  Do not use clear microtiter plates for fluorescence readings.

You will need 100 μl diluted PicoGreen reagent per well.

Total amount of 1X TE per assay will be 200 μl per well which includes the amount of TE used to dilute the PicoGreen reagent.
protocol_affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona/Ohio State University
affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona, The Ohio State University

authors_list.name: Matthew Sullivan Lab
authors_list.affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona/Ohio State University

guidelines:
DNA Standard Vol.μl DNA Vol.μl 1x TE Vol μl PicoGreen (1:200) Final DNA Standard ng/mL
Low DNA Standard  0 100 100 0
(1:1000 of 100 μg/ml) 1 99 100 0.5
  5 95 100 2.5
  10 90 100 5.0
  20 80 100 10
  50 50 100 25
  80 20 100 40
  100 0 100 50
High DNA Standard  0 100 100 0
  (1:50 of 100 μg/ml) 1 99 100 10
  5 95 100 50
  10 90 100 100
  20 80 100 200
  50 50 100 500
  80 20 100 800
  100 0 100 1000

components.data: Warm Quant-iT PicoGreen reagent to room temp in the dark.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Warm Quant-iT PicoGreen reagent to room temp in the dark.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.annotation: PicoGreen reagent is diluted in dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) which solidifies at refrigerator temperatures.  It must be completely liquified before use by allowing it to come to room temperature.  Vortex solution briefly to mix well and centrifuge for 5 sec to bring liquid to bottom of tube; then dispense for use in the assay.   PicoGreen reagent is also light-sensitive, so reagent should be protected from light.
source_data.thread_text: PicoGreen reagent is diluted in dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) which solidifies at refrigerator temperatures.  It must be completely liquified before use by allowing it to come to room temperature.  Vortex solution briefly to mix well and centrifuge for 5 sec to bring liquid to bottom of tube; then dispense for use in the assay.   PicoGreen reagent is also light-sensitive, so reagent should be protected from light.
source_data.body: PicoGreen reagent is diluted in dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) which solidifies at refrigerator temperatures.  It must be completely liquified before use by allowing it to come to room temperature.  Vortex solution briefly to mix well and centrifuge for 5 sec to bring liquid to bottom of tube; then dispense for use in the assay.   PicoGreen reagent is also light-sensitive, so reagent should be protected from light.
source_data.affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona, The Ohio State University

components.data: Prepare 1XTE buffer from 20X stock solution using nuclease-free water:  will need 200 μl/well (for diluting standards, samples and PicoGreen).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Prepare 1XTE buffer from 20X stock solution using nuclease-free water:  will need 200 μl/well (for diluting standards, samples and PicoGreen).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 2 of Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.annotation: Prepare 1X TE by pipetting 2.5 mL of 20X stock TE into a sterile 50 mL centrifuge tube and filling to 50 mL mark with molecular biology grade water.  Invert tube to mix.
source_data.thread_text: Prepare 1X TE by pipetting 2.5 mL of 20X stock TE into a sterile 50 mL centrifuge tube and filling to 50 mL mark with molecular biology grade water.  Invert tube to mix.
source_data.body: Prepare 1X TE by pipetting 2.5 mL of 20X stock TE into a sterile 50 mL centrifuge tube and filling to 50 mL mark with molecular biology grade water.  Invert tube to mix.
source_data.affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona, The Ohio State University

components.data: Dilute DNA standard to either “High” 2 μg/mL (1:50 of λ DNA stock) or “Low” 50 ng/mL (1:1000 of λ DNA stock).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute DNA standard to either “High” 2 μg/mL (1:50 of λ DNA stock) or “Low” 50 ng/mL (1:1000 of λ DNA stock).

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 3 of Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.annotation: It is best to run standards in duplicate, and if amount of DNA in samples is unknown or varys widely, it is also best to run both the high and low DNA standards.
source_data.thread_text: It is best to run standards in duplicate, and if amount of DNA in samples is unknown or varys widely, it is also best to run both the high and low DNA standards.

components.data: Determine amount of sample to assay (eg, 2μl sample in total of 100μl TE buffer).  Add correct amount of TE buffer to all wells.  Add standards to wells.  Then add samples to wells.
components.name: Description

components.data: Dilute PicoGreen 1:200 in TE buffer and protect from light until ready to add to plate.
components.name: Description

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 5 of Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)

source_data.protocol_name_html: Quanti-iT™ Pico Green dsDNA Assay (Invitrogen P7589)
source_data.annotation: A 1:200 dilution of PicoGreen reagent is prepared by adding 10 μl of PicoGreen per 2 mL of 1X TE buffer.  You will need 100 ul diluted PicoGreen per well containing 100 ul sample.
source_data.thread_text: A 1:200 dilution of PicoGreen reagent is prepared by adding 10 μl of PicoGreen per 2 mL of 1X TE buffer.  You will need 100 ul diluted PicoGreen per well containing 100 ul sample.

components.data: Add equivalent volume (100 μl) of diluted PicoGreen to every well (keeping plate in the dark as much as possible).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add equivalent volume (100 μl) of diluted PicoGreen to every well (keeping plate in the dark as much as possible).

components.data: Incubate 5 minutes at room temperature keeping plate in the dark.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate 5 minutes at room temperature keeping plate in the dark.

components.data: Take fluorescent readings using 485nm excitation and 535nm emission filters.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Take fluorescent readings using 485nm excitation and 535nm emission filters.

components.data: Determine standard curve and calculate concentration of DNA in samples (see table in the guidelines).
